titleStmt.title: The closet of the eminently learned Sir Kenelme Digbie Kt. opened whereby is discovered several ways for making of metheglin, sider, cherry-wine, &c. : together with excellent directions for cookery, as also for preserving, conserving, candying, &c. / published by his son's consent.
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. for H. Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
